text: NIA offers single copies and bulk quantities of this free bookmark as part of its Go4Life exercise and physical activity campaign for older adults. Quantities may be ordered by senior centers, healthcare providers, fitness centers, and other organizations. The colorful, 3” x 8” bookmark tells readers about the campaign and the Go4Life website. It also briefly describes of NIA’s Go4Life exercise and physical activity campaign. Also available: Go4Life “Curl up with a good book!” bookmark
